column5: Hey Dave.  Does any of the OFC post's you read make you think of a topic for a show?  Either a lure or a place to go fish?  Just wondering, cheers.  Geoff

Hey Geoff, Sure we do and if people would do me a favor and just post there GPS #'s it sure would be a lot easier lol. Honestly we plan our shoots no different than most anglers plan any fishing trip and get info from a bunch of different areas. The only difference is we pack less beer than most.  Dave
*crosses Dave Mercer off his list of fishing buddies*
That's because (if memory serves me right) your a Scotch man, or was it Rye....LOL
Double Rum - Tall Glass!    I tried to keep up with the doubles at a Christmas party a couple of years ago... Ginny had to drive home the next morning!
Thanks Ryan, I knew it was something other than beer.  If I tried to keep up I too would need a ride home.
So you read about our BOQ G2G then did ya...
